name: PauseSubscription
description:
Schedule a pause for an active subscription.

Use this tool to pause an active subscription by scheduling a `PAUSE` action. Call it when you need to temporarily halt a subscription's services.

parameters.name: subscription_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the subscription you want to pause.

value_schema.description: The ID of the subscription to pause.

parameters.name: pause_effective_date
parameters.description: The `YYYY-MM-DD`-formatted date when the scheduled `PAUSE` action occurs. If unspecified or within the current billing cycle, the subscription pauses at the start of the next cycle.

value_schema.description:
The `YYYY-MM-DD`-formatted date when the scheduled `PAUSE` action takes place on the subscription.

When this date is unspecified or falls within the current billing cycle, the subscription is paused
on the starting date of the next billing cycle.

parameters.name: pause_cycle_count
parameters.description: Specify the number of billing cycles to pause the subscription. A 'RESUME' action will be scheduled at the end of this period. Do not set 'resume_effective_date' or 'resume_change_timing' if this is used.

value_schema.description:
The number of billing cycles the subscription will be paused before it is reactivated. 

When this is set, a `RESUME` action is also scheduled to take place on the subscription at 
the end of the specified pause cycle duration. In this case, neither `resume_effective_date` 
nor `resume_change_timing` may be specified.

parameters.name: reactivation_date
parameters.description: The date (YYYY-MM-DD) when the subscription is reactivated by a scheduled `RESUME` action. Must be at least one billing cycle after `pause_effective_date`.

value_schema.description:
The date when the subscription is reactivated by a scheduled `RESUME` action. 
This date must be at least one billing cycle ahead of `pause_effective_date`.

parameters.name: resume_change_timing
parameters.description: Specifies when the subscription resume action takes place. Options are 'IMMEDIATE' or 'END_OF_BILLING_CYCLE'.

value_schema.description: Supported timings when a pending change, as an action, takes place to a subscription.

parameters.name: pause_reason
parameters.description: The reason provided by the user for pausing the subscription. It should convey the rationale behind the pause action.

value_schema.description: The user-provided reason to pause the subscription.
